testcase.name: Verify Global Configuration Page › should be able to successfully view Global config page
Verify create site name › Should successfully create and display the site name
Verify Vlan Start field › Should successfully display by default the 11100 in the field
Verify ON maintenance mode › should be able to successfully ON and display Maintence mode word in multiportal
Verify OFF maintenance mode › should be able to successfully Off and disabled maintenance mode

failure.message: 13_Verify_OFF_maintenance_mode.spec.ts:7:7 should be able to successfully Off and disabled maintenance mode
